long.en:
Optimize customer files to enhance the sales conversion rate of your business and maximize advertising cost savings.

âœ… Diverse potential customer filters, integrated with Pancake.
âœ… Strict adherence to Facebook policies to avoid Page suspension.
âœ… Support for sending text, images, videos, and marketing files.
âœ… Easy session storage and customer data extraction through CSV/Excel files.
âœ… No storage of sensitive customer data on the cloud.
âœ… Essential software for Facebook sellers.
âœ… Free trial available.
âœ… 1-on-1 support and tailored marketing strategy consultation via Zalo/Telegram.
